Model Symbols and Definitions


| Symbol                  | Definition                                     |
|-------------------------|------------------------------------------------|
| $y$                     | Year                                           |
| $a$                     | Age class                                      |
| $a_0$                   | Age at recruitment (age-2)                     |
| $a_+$                   | Plus group age (age-31 and older)              |
| $s$                     | Sex (male or female)                           |
| $f$                     | Fleet (fixed (LL), trawl (TR))                 |
| $\delta_s^{\text{log}}$ | Logistic slope for fixed-gear selectivity (sex $s$) |
| $a_{50,s}$              | Age at 50% selectivity for fixed gear (sex $s$) |
| $\delta_s^{\text{dome}}$| Dome width parameter for trawl selectivity (sex $s$) |
| $a_{\max,s}$            | Age at peak selectivity for trawl gear (sex $s$) |
| $p$                     | Gamma spread parameter for dome-shaped trawl selectivity |
| $R_y$                   | Annual recruitment at age-2                    |
| $N_{y,a,s}$             | Numbers-at-age in year $y$, age $a$, sex $s$  |
| $Z_{y,a,s}$             | Total instantaneous mortality                  |
| $F_{y,a,s,f}$           | Fleet-specific fishing mortality               |
| $F_{y,a,s}$             | Total fishing mortality across fleets          |
| $M_{y,a,s}$             | Natural mortality                              |
| $v_{y,a,s,f}$           | Selectivity-at-age by fleet                     |
| $r_{y,a,s,f}$           | Retention-at-age by fleet                       |
| $d_{y,a,s,f}$           | Discard mortality rate                          |
| $w_{y,a,s}$             | Weight-at-age                                  |
| $m_{y,a,s}$             | Maturity-at-age                                |
| $C_{y,a,f}$             | Catch-at-age by fleet                          |
| $C_y$                   | Total catch in year $y$                        |
| $B_y$                   | Total biomass in year $y$                      |
| $SSB_y$                 | Female spawning stock biomass in year $y$     |
| $q_{LL}, q_{TR}$        | Survey catchability coefficients               |
| $I_{y,LL}, I_{y,TR}$    | Survey indices (longline, trawl)               |
| $\sigma_{LL}, \sigma_{TR}$ | Survey index standard deviations             |
| $\epsilon_y$            | Survey observation error                       |
| $n^*$                   | Sample size for compositions                   |
| $P_{a,s}$               | Composition Number of individuals sampled at age $a$ |

                                     





Population dynamics
$$
N_{y,a,s} =
\begin{cases}
R_y/2, & a = a_0 \\
N_{y-1,a-1,s} e^{-Z_{y-1,a-1,s}}, & a_0 < a < a_+ \\
N_{y-1,a-1,s} e^{-Z_{y-1,a-1,s}} + N_{y-1,a_+,s} e^{-Z_{y-1,a_+,s}}, & a = a_+
\end{cases}
$$

$$
Z_{y,a,s} = F_{y,a,s} + M_{y,a,s}
$$

$$
F_{y,a,s} = \sum_f F_{y,a,s,f}
$$

$$
F_{y,a,s,f} = v_{y,a,s,f} \cdot \left[F_{y,f} \cdot r_{y,a,s,f} + d_{y,a,s,f} \cdot (1 - r_{y,a,s,f}) \right]
$$

Selectivity Functions  
Fixed Gear (Logistic)
$$
v_{y,a,s,\text{LL}} = \frac{1}{1 + \exp\left( -\delta_s^{\text{log}} (a - a_{50,s}) \right)}
$$

Trawl Gear (Dome-shaped Gamma)
$$
v_{y,a,s,\text{TR}} = \left(\frac{a}{a_{+,s}}\right)^{a_{+,s}/p} \cdot \exp\left( \frac{a_{+,s} - a}{p} \right)
\quad\text{with } p = 0.5 \sqrt{a_{+,s}^2 + 4\left(\delta_s^{\text{dome}}\right)^2} - a_{+,s}
$$


Equations describing observation data

$$
C_{y,a,f} = \sum_{s=1}^2 \frac{F_{y,a,s,f}}{F_{y,a,s,f} + M_{y,a,s}} N_{y,a,s} \left( 1 - e^{-Z_{y,a,s}} \right) w_{y,a,s} 
$$

Annual Catch 
$$
C_y = \sum_a \sum_f C_{y,a,f}
$$

Annual total biomass  
$$
B_y = \sum_a \sum_s N_{y,a,s} w_{y,a,s}
$$

Annual spawning stock biomass (SSB)  
$$
SSB_y = \sum_a N_{y,a,\text{female}} \cdot w_{y,a,\text{female}} \cdot m_{y,a,\text{female}}
$$

Longline Survey (Abundance Index)   
$$
I_{y,LL} = q_{LL} \left[ \sum_a \sum_s N_{y,a,s} \cdot e^{-Z_{y,a,s}/2} \cdot v_{y,a,s,LL} \right] \cdot e^{\epsilon_y - \sigma_{LL}^2 / 2}
$$

Bottom Trawl Survey (Biomass Index)  
$$
I_{y,TR} = q_{TR} \left[ \sum_a \sum_s N_{y,a,s} \cdot e^{-Z_{y,a,s}/2} \cdot v_{y,a,s,BT} \cdot w_{y,a,s} \right] \cdot e^{\epsilon_y - \sigma_{TR}^2 / 2}
$$

Age Composition Data  
Multinomial Sampling  

$$
P_{a,s} \sim \text{Multinomial} \left( \frac{N_{a,s}}{\sum_{a,s} N_{a,s}}, n^* \right)
$$

Sample sizes:

 - Longline survey and fixed gear fleet: $n^* = 50$
 - Trawl survey and trawl fleet: $n^* = 30$
